name: Aid grant excluding debt reorganisation
category-description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which no legal debt is incurred by the recipient.

name: Subsidies to national private investors
category-description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which no legal debt is incurred by the recipient.

name: Interest subsidy grant in AF
category-description: Subsidies to soften the terms of private export credits, or loans or credits by the banking sector.

name: Interest subsidy to national private exporters
category-description: Subsidies to soften the terms of private export credits, or loans or credits by the banking sector.

name: Deposit basis
category-description: Payments to multilateral agencies in the form of notes and similar instruments, unconditionally cashable at sight by the recipient institutions.

name: Encashment basis
category-description: Payments to multilateral agencies in the form of notes and similar instruments, unconditionally cashable at sight by the recipient institutions.

name: Aid loan excluding debt reorganisation
category-description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt.

name: Investment-related loan to developing countries
category-description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt.

name: Loan in a joint venture with the recipient
category-description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt.

name: Loan to national private investor
category-description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt.

name: Loan to national private exporter
category-description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt.

name: Non-banks guaranteed export credits
category-description: Official or private loans which are primarily export-facilitating in purpose. They are usually tied to a specific export from the extending country and not represented by a negotiable instrument.

name: Non-banks non-guaranteed portions of guaranteed export credits
category-description: Official or private loans which are primarily export-facilitating in purpose. They are usually tied to a specific export from the extending country and not represented by a negotiable instrument.

name: Bank export credits
category-description: Official or private loans which are primarily export-facilitating in purpose. They are usually tied to a specific export from the extending country and not represented by a negotiable instrument.

name: Acquisition of equity as part of a joint venture with the recipient
category-description: Investment in a country on the DAC List of ODA Recipients that is not made to acquire a lasting interest in an enterprise.

name: Acquisition of equity not part of joint venture in developing countries
category-description: Investment in a country on the DAC List of ODA Recipients that is not made to acquire a lasting interest in an enterprise.

name: Other acquisition of equity. Investment in a country on the DAC List of ODA Recipients that is not made to acquire a lasting interest in an enterprise.
category-description: Investment in a country on the DAC List of ODA Recipients that is not made to acquire a lasting interest in an enterprise.
